New Records: The Cubs became the first team in MLB history to overcome a 7+ run deficit in the 7th inning, winning 14-10.
Key Match Events: Christian Benthancourt hit a two-run homer in the 7th inning
Bethancourt hit a two-run single in the 9th inning
Ian Happ hit an RBI single in the 8th inning
Mike Tauchman and Seiya Suzuki hit RBI singles in the 9th inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Cubs knew they couldn't afford any slip-ups as they looked to force themselves back into the playoff picture.
Post-Match Reflections: The win could be a season-defining victory for the Cubs, potentially propelling them to the postseason.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs' comeback victory marked their third consecutive win.
Others: Before the Pirates' lead, teams with a 7+ run lead entering the 7th inning were 1,192-0.
